title: There's a massive sale on All-Clad, Staub, and Le Creuset cookware
text:
— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

For many of us out there who love to cook, the current state of our kitchens doesn't quite live up to our ideals. Unfortunately the sad reality is that it may never look like Ina Garten's kitchen does in Barefoot Contessa, but hey, a girl can dream. If you fantasize about adorning your countertops with fancy, high-end cookware but don't want to break the bank, boy do I have news for you. Sur La Table's Anniversary Sale has finally arrived, meaning you can score some truly incredible savings on all your kitchen needs.

Right now, you can save up to 70% on the best cookware, appliances, and cooking tools on the market, from brands like Le Creuset, Staub, and All-Clad, which is a pretty huge deal for those of us who know our way around a kitchen. In addition, they're also offering free shipping on orders over $59, so you'll get a little reward for spending enough.

To help you shop this bonanza of cooking deals, we've already perused the sale and hand-picked the items that we're most excited about. Whether you just moved into a new apartment or want to make sure your kitchen is fully stocked for the holidays, there's something for everyone included in this sale. Ahead, you'll find our list of the fourteen best products to stock your counters, cabinets, and drawers with.

1. The iconic Le Creuset Dutch oven

It's fall wedding season—and this is one of the most requested gifts. More

It’s on basically every wedding registry, so you might as well save on a Le Creuset Dutch oven for those upcoming fall weddings (or for yourself). Seriously, this cookware is insanely popular and will last a lifetime. Right now, you can get the deep round Dutch oven on sale in five classic colors. This deep size is perfect for frying foods or making large soups without splattering all over yourself.

Get the Le Creuset Signature Deep Round Dutch Oven, 5.5 Qt. for $199.96 (Save $124.99)

2. All-Clad skillets that won’t stick

Saute your favorite foods with a set of iconic cookware. More

All-Clad has made a name for itself as some of the best cookware money can buy, so we jump at the opportunity to save on them. It’s even better when you can get them brand spanking new. At 8-inches and 10-inches these are probably the two most used skillets in a household, so you might as well spurge on good ones (while still saving). Plus, they’re nonstick so you won’t have to worry about aggressively scrubbing burnt eggs or sauces off them.

Get the All-CLad HA1 Nonstick Skillets, 8” and 10” Set for $47.96 (Save $72.04)

3. A loaf pan that’s great for tender bread

Make your holiday cakes in the best of the best. More

Fall is the perfect season to enjoy homemade pumpkin bread and banana bread. But you’re going to need a good loaf pan, so you don’t end up with burnt edges or pieces stuck to the bottom. This one is the Sur la Table version of our favorite loaf pan for tender cakes, making it ideal for whatever breads and cakes you have planned for this holiday season.
description: Sur La Table's Anniversary Sale just started, so now's your chance to save on high-end kitchenware from All-Clad, Le Creuset, Staub, and much more.
